entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:56 p.m. EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Thunderstorm, 10.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:54 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
